title: Lunar Eclipse Diana
body:
Here is some Diana skin I had in mind. I know, I am not that skilled in digital painting, but I hope the idea gets across...
Ingame I thougt that it would be nice, if the light effects of her skills would get darker over time (maybe with champion level).
Her backport animation could be some pose in which she transforms into moonlight and vanishes - the colour of the effect would be the same as her skills then.

Maybe I will do some concepts in the future too, if someone is interested in it.
Greetings, 

Saphyll
